title: 如何在bukkit中新建一个固定的location
author: _XuanFsant_
txt_content: 如题，想做一个定点传送，之前只用过player.getlocation()的方法，但是不会定义一个固定的坐标

replies.author: Sky_way_33
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sky_way_33 于 2020-6-6 12:10 编辑 
Location(World world, double x, double y, double z)
以给定的坐标构造一个Location对象.
Location(World world, double x, double y, double z, float yaw, float pitch)
以给定的坐标和朝向构造一个Location对象.复制代码
Example:Location loc = new Location(Bukkit.getWorld("world"),100,200,300);

replies.author: _XuanFsant_
